name: quickwit
description: Quickwit is a cloud-native search engine for large-scale log storage and querying. It offers web-based query UI, REST APIs, and is optimized for low storage costs and fast indexing.

features.title: Cloud
features.description: Designed for object storage like S3 to minimize infrastructure costs and maximize scalability

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Ingest millions of logs per second with distributed indexing across multiple nodes

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Query logs using Elasticsearch-compatible syntax for familiar search operations

features.title: Web Query Ui
features.description: Execute searches and visualize results through an intuitive browser-based interface

features.title: REST API
features.description: Integrate log search into applications and dashboards using standard HTTP endpoints
